name: Blue Ninja: Rainbow Rage
description:
"Everybody have only one chance. Except you. You have to be special" - random guy WARNING: This game contains flashing colors.

Next pixelart platformer, eh? Let us tell you why BLUE NINJA RAINBOW RAGE will be your favourite game ever. (maybe)

Features

-Fast-paced, hard and epileptic gameplay. (You probably won't even complete demo)

-Your favourite music! (You need to play it from Youtube tho)

-Save the world. Find your father. Rescue your wife. (Completly straight plot with no hidden meaning)

-Almost good-looking pixel art. (You know what is consistent graphic style? Turns out our artists don't)

-Beat you highscores and publish them on global leaderboards (If devs won't be so lazy and actually add them. But if you actually completed this demo, you can visit us on our discord(https://discord.gg/v2kpJxz) and maybe your score will be saved forever on #hall-of-fame)

And remember: What you do is right, Don't question your actions. Disclaimer: This is only a early acces demo. If you want to ask something or report a bug, go to our discord
